title: Part b. [0â€“3]
stimulusHtml:
3 points

1 point: For expression for the maximum frictional force
f2(max) = Âµs2N2= Âµs2 (m1 + m2)g

1 point: For equating this force to the tension T = Mg
Mg = Âµs2 (m1 + m2)g

1 point: For the correct answer
M = Âµs2 (m1 + m2)

title: Part c. [0â€“3]
stimulusHtml:
3 points

1 point: For correctly applying Newton's second law to the hanging block
ð¨F = ma
Mg â€“ T = Ma (equation 1)

1 point: For correctly applying Newton's second law to the system of the two blocks on the plane
ð¨F = (m1 + m2)a
T â€“ f2 = (m1 + m2)a (equation 2)

1 point: For combining equations 1 and 2 to eliminate T, substituting for f2, and solving for a
For example, solve each equation for T and set them equal.
f2 + (m1 + m2)a = Mg â€“ Ma
Âµk2 (m1 + m2)g + (m1 + m2)a = Mg â€“ Ma

ii. 2 points

Apply Newton's second law to the hanging block
ð¨F = ma
Mg â€“ T = Ma2 (equation 1)

1 point: For correctly applying Newton's second law to block 2
ð¨F = ma
T â€“ f1 â€“ f2 = m2a2 (equation 2)

1 point: For combining equations 1 and 2 to eliminate T , substituting for the frictional forces and solving for a2.
For example, solve each equation for T and set them equal.
